## common.validateWithSchema() function

根据JSON Schema验证数据

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function validateWithSchema<T>(schema: JSONSchemaType<T>, data: unknown): JSONValidationResult<T>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

schema


</td><td>

JSONSchemaType&lt;T&gt;


</td><td>

JSON Schema


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

data


</td><td>

unknown


</td><td>

待验证数据


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

JSONValidationResult&lt;T&gt;

验证结果

## Remarks

版本: 1.1.0 分类: JSON验证

## Example


```typescript
const schema = {
  type: 'object',
  properties: {
    name: { type: 'string' },
    age: { type: 'number' }
  },
  required: ['name', 'age']
} as const;

const data = { name: 'John', age: 30 };
const result = validateWithSchema(schema, data);
// result.valid === true
```
